CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsAsyncCallsUsed__c / LimitsAsyncCallsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Async Calls
